text: 5.8: Ais 58.7; Mt 18.17; Ga 6.10; Ta 1.16Ndu mbarara. Maaŋ muuŋgip, guma the ana wo phorge rɨgi vɨzɨna bavira gari fhu, ana vhɨra won fegutari, ana mbe gari fhu, mba guma, ana guigira Zisas khothɨgi tɨv, ana ana thav, ana guigira guma mbatɨk ma. Nde guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi, nde mba tɨva mbuav, nde mba Zisas khothɨgi fhuv gumgi kambarav, nde guigira tɨva mbatɨga mbui.
